successes.title: Digitize Village Picture Shows!
successes.description: Manchester, VT's only movie theatre HAS to purchase digital equipment or close.  35mm is kaput in 2013, digital is the only way!

Pledges.description: Your name will be on our "wall of fame" in the lobby!  And if you send us a jpeg of your picture, we will put your splendid mug up on our big screen with a huge THANK YOU!
Your name on our "wall of fame."  A one-time movie pass to the show of your choice!
Your name on our "wall of fame" and a Village Picture Shows T-shirt!
Four free one-time movie passes for the show of your choice.  Your name on our "wall of fame."
One free movie pass for the ENTIRE YEAR!  Your name on our "wall of fame."
Two movie passes good for the ENTIRE YEAR! Come see all our new DIGITAL movies....every one of them...on us!  We'll throw in popcorn, every time you come!

Free advertising for a year on our big screen!  Use it for your own business or for your favorite charity or cause!  Heck, you can put all your family photos up there for the world to see if you want to - we will put ANYTHING on that big screen for ya (as long as it's legal :)   Plus, two free passes for the WHOLE YEAR!

You will be the proud owner of a true piece of art and history!  We will bestow upon you one 35mm projector!  Use it as a conversation piece in your living room, or save it until it becomes worth a fortune.  Hey, the record player is making a comeback!   First come, first served!  PLUS you will receive one year free Big Screen advertising for your business or your very own personal cause.  PLUS, you will receive FOUR free movie passes good for the entire year!  Do you want popcorn with that?  Well, OK...we'll serve it up!
